price: Yaani Mtume aliye toka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu anaye wasomea kurasa zilizo takasika!
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ
footnotes: Na hoja hiyo ni Mtume aliye tumwa kutokana na Mwenyezi Mungu awasomee kurasa zilizo takasika na upotovu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
